00064     public DatabaseSnapshot(Database database, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners) throws JDBCException {
00065         this(database, statusListeners, database.getDefaultSchemaName());

00071     public DatabaseSnapshot(Database database, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners, String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00072         try {
00073             this.database = database;
00074             this.databaseMetaData = database.getConnection().getMetaData();
00075             this.statusListeners = statusListeners;
00076 
00077             readTablesAndViews(requestedSchema);
00078             readForeignKeyInformation(requestedSchema);
00079             readPrimaryKeys(requestedSchema);
00080             readColumns(requestedSchema);
00081 //            readUniqueConstraints(catalog, schema);
00082             readIndexes(requestedSchema);
00083             readSequences(requestedSchema);
00084 
00085             this.tables = new HashSet<Table>(tablesMap.values());
00086             this.views = new HashSet<View>(viewsMap.values());
00087             this.columns = new HashSet<Column>(columnsMap.values());
00088         } catch (SQLException e) {
00089             throw new JDBCException(e);
00090         }
00091     }
00092

00095         return database;

00099         return tables;
00100     }
00101 
00102     public Set<View> getViews() {
00103         return views;
00104     }

00106     public Column getColumn(Column column) {
00107         if (column.getTable() == null) {
00108             return columnsMap.get(column.getView().getName() + "." + column.getName());
00109         } else {
00110             return columnsMap.get(column.getTable().getName() + "." + column.getName());
00111         }
00112     }
00113 
00114     public Column getColumn(String tableName, String columnName) {
00115         return columnsMap.get(tableName + "." + columnName);
00116     }
00117 
00118     public Set<Column> getColumns() {
00119         return columns;
00120     }

00123         return foreignKeys;
00124     }

00127         return indexes;

00131         return primaryKeys;
00132     }

00135     public Set<Sequence> getSequences() {
00136         return sequences;

00139     private void readTablesAndViews(String schema) throws SQLException, JDBCException {
00140         updateListeners("Reading tables for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00141         ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getTables(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), null, new String[]{"TABLE", "VIEW"});
00142         while (rs.next()) {
00143             String type = rs.getString("TABLE_TYPE");
00144             String name = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME");
00145             String schemaName = rs.getString("TABLE_SCHEM");
00146             String catalogName = rs.getString("TABLE_CAT");
00147             String remarks = rs.getString("REMARKS");
00148 
00149             if (database.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, name) || database.isLiquibaseTable(name) || database.isSystemView(catalogName, schemaName, name)) {
00150                 continue;
00151             }
00152 
00153             if ("TABLE".equals(type)) {
00154                 Table table = new Table(name);
00155                 table.setRemarks(StringUtils.trimToNull(remarks));
00156                 table.setDatabase(database);
00157                 tablesMap.put(name, table);
00158             } else if ("VIEW".equals(type)) {
00159                 View view = new View();
00160                 view.setName(name);
00161                 try {
00162                     view.setDefinition(database.getViewDefinition(schema, name));
00163                 } catch (JDBCException e) {
00164                     System.out.println("Error getting view with " + ((AbstractDatabase) database).getViewDefinitionSql(schema, name));
00165                     throw e;
00166                 }
00167 
00168                 viewsMap.put(name, view);
00169 
00170             }
00171         }
00172         rs.close();
00173 
00174         /* useful for troubleshooting table reading */
00175 //        if (tablesMap.size() == 0) {
00176 //            System.out.println("No tables found, all tables:");
00177 //
00178 //            String convertedCatalog = database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema);
00179 //            String convertedSchema = database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema);
00180 //
00181 //            System.out.println("Tried: "+convertedCatalog+"."+convertedSchema);
00182 //            convertedCatalog = null;
00183 //            convertedSchema = null;
00184 //
00185 //            rs = databaseMetaData.getTables(convertedCatalog, convertedSchema, null, new String[]{"TABLE", "VIEW"});
00186 //            while (rs.next()) {
00187 //                String type = rs.getString("TABLE_TYPE");
00188 //                String name = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME");
00189 //                String schemaName = rs.getString("TABLE_SCHEM");
00190 //                String catalogName = rs.getString("TABLE_CAT");
00191 //
00192 //                if (database.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, name) || database.isLiquibaseTable(name) || database.isSystemView(catalogName, schemaName, name)) {
00193 //                    continue;
00194 //                }
00195 //
00196 //                System.out.println(catalogName+"."+schemaName+"."+name+":"+type);
00197 //
00198 //            }
00199 //            rs.close();
00200 //        }
00201     }
00202 
00203     private void readColumns(String schema) throws SQLException, JDBCException {
00204         updateListeners("Reading columns for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00205 
00206         Statement selectStatement = database.getConnection().createStatement();
00207         ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getColumns(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), null, null);
00208         while (rs.next()) {
00209             Column columnInfo = new Column();
00210 
00211             String tableName = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME");
00212             String columnName = rs.getString("COLUMN_NAME");
00213             String schemaName = rs.getString("TABLE_SCHEM");
00214             String catalogName = rs.getString("TABLE_CAT");
00215 
00216             if (database.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, tableName) || database.isLiquibaseTable(tableName)) {
00217                 continue;
00218             }
00219 
00220             Table table = tablesMap.get(tableName);
00221             if (table == null) {
00222                 View view = viewsMap.get(tableName);
00223                 if (view == null) {
00224                     log.info("Could not find table or view " + tableName + " for column " + columnName);
00225                     continue;
00226                 } else {
00227                     columnInfo.setView(view);
00228                     view.getColumns().add(columnInfo);
00229                 }
00230             } else {
00231                 columnInfo.setTable(table);
00232                 table.getColumns().add(columnInfo);
00233             }
00234 
00235             columnInfo.setName(columnName);
00236             columnInfo.setDataType(rs.getInt("DATA_TYPE"));
00237             columnInfo.setColumnSize(rs.getInt("COLUMN_SIZE"));
00238             columnInfo.setDecimalDigits(rs.getInt("DECIMAL_DIGITS"));
00239             Object defaultValue = rs.getObject("COLUMN_DEF");
00240             try {
00241                 columnInfo.setDefaultValue(database.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, columnInfo.getDataType(), columnInfo.getColumnSize(), columnInfo.getDecimalDigits()));
00242             } catch (ParseException e) {
00243                 throw new JDBCException(e);
00244             }
00245 
00246             int nullable = rs.getInt("NULLABLE");
00247             if (nullable == DatabaseMetaData.columnNoNulls) {
00248                 columnInfo.setNullable(false);
00249             } else if (nullable == DatabaseMetaData.columnNullable) {
00250                 columnInfo.setNullable(true);
00251             }
00252 
00253             columnInfo.setPrimaryKey(isPrimaryKey(columnInfo));
00254 
00255             columnInfo.setAutoIncrement(database.isColumnAutoIncrement(schema, tableName, columnName));
00256 
00257             columnInfo.setTypeName(database.getColumnType(rs.getString("TYPE_NAME"), columnInfo.isAutoIncrement()));            
00258 
00259 
00260             columnsMap.put(tableName + "." + columnName, columnInfo);
00261         }
00262         rs.close();
00263         selectStatement.close();
00264     }
00265 
00266     private boolean isPrimaryKey(Column columnInfo) {
00267         for (PrimaryKey pk : getPrimaryKeys()) {
00268             if (columnInfo.getTable() == null) {
00269                 continue;
00270             }
00271             if (pk.getTable().getName().equalsIgnoreCase(columnInfo.getTable().getName())) {
00272                 if (pk.getColumnNamesAsList().contains(columnInfo.getName())) {
00273                     return true;
00274                 }
00275             }
00276         }
00277 
00278         return false;
00279     }
00280 
00281     private void readForeignKeyInformation(String schema) throws JDBCException, SQLException {
00282         updateListeners("Reading foreign keys for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00283 
00284         for (Table table : tablesMap.values()) {
00285             String dbCatalog = database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema);
00286             String dbSchema = database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema);
00287             ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getExportedKeys(dbCatalog, dbSchema, table.getName());
00288             ForeignKey fkInfo = null;
00289             while (rs.next()) {
00290                 String pkTableName = rs.getString("PKTABLE_NAME");
00291                 String pkColumn = rs.getString("PKCOLUMN_NAME");
00292                 Table pkTable = tablesMap.get(pkTableName);
00293                 if (pkTable == null) {
00294                     throw new JDBCException("Could not find table " + pkTableName + " for column " + pkColumn);
00295                 }
00296                 int keySeq = rs.getInt("KEY_SEQ");
00297                 //Simple (non-composite) keys have KEY_SEQ=1, so create the ForeignKey.
00298                 //In case of subsequent parts of composite keys (KEY_SEQ>1) don't create new instance, just reuse the one from previous call.
00299                 //According to #getExportedKeys() contract, the result set rows are properly sorted, so the reuse of previous FK instance is safe.
00300                 if (keySeq == 1) {
00301                         fkInfo = new ForeignKey();
00302                 }
00303                 
00304                 fkInfo.setPrimaryKeyTable(pkTable);
00305                 fkInfo.addPrimaryKeyColumn(pkColumn);
00306 
00307                 String fkTableName = rs.getString("FKTABLE_NAME");
00308                 String fkColumn = rs.getString("FKCOLUMN_NAME");
00309                 Table fkTable = tablesMap.get(fkTableName);
00310                 if (fkTable == null) {
00311                     throw new JDBCException("Could not find table " + fkTableName + " for column " + fkColumn);
00312                 }
00313                 fkInfo.setForeignKeyTable(fkTable);
00314                 fkInfo.addForeignKeyColumn(fkColumn);
00315 
00316                 fkInfo.setName(rs.getString("FK_NAME"));
00317 
00318                 if (database.supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns()) {
00319                     short deferrablility = rs.getShort("DEFERRABILITY");
00320                     if (deferrablility == DatabaseMetaData.importedKeyInitiallyDeferred) {
00321                         fkInfo.setDeferrable(Boolean.TRUE);
00322                         fkInfo.setInitiallyDeferred(Boolean.TRUE);
00323                     } else if (deferrablility == DatabaseMetaData.importedKeyInitiallyImmediate) {
00324                         fkInfo.setDeferrable(Boolean.TRUE);
00325                         fkInfo.setInitiallyDeferred(Boolean.FALSE);
00326                     } else if (deferrablility == DatabaseMetaData.importedKeyNotDeferrable) {
00327                         fkInfo.setDeferrable(Boolean.FALSE);
00328                         fkInfo.setInitiallyDeferred(Boolean.FALSE);
00329                     }
00330                 }
00331 
00332                 //Add only if the key was created in this iteration (updating the instance values changes hashCode so it cannot be re-inserted into set) 
00333                 if (keySeq == 1) {
00334                         foreignKeys.add(fkInfo);
00335                 }
00336             }
00337 
00338             rs.close();
00339         }
00340     }
00341 
00342     private void readIndexes(String schema) throws JDBCException, SQLException {
00343         updateListeners("Reading indexes for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00344 
00345         for (Table table : tablesMap.values()) {
00346             ResultSet rs;
00347             Statement statement = null;
00348             if (database instanceof OracleDatabase) {
00349                 //oracle getIndexInfo is buggy and slow.  See Issue 1824548 and http://forums.oracle.com/forums/thread.jspa?messageID=578383&#578383  
00350                 statement = database.getConnection().createStatement();
00351                 String sql = "SELECT INDEX_NAME, 3 AS TYPE, TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_POSITION AS ORDINAL_POSITION, null AS FILTER_CONDITION FROM ALL_IND_COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_OWNER='" + database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema) + "' AND TABLE_NAME='" + table.getName() + "' ORDER BY INDEX_NAME, ORDINAL_POSITION";
00352                 rs = statement.executeQuery(sql);
00353             } else {
00354                 rs = databaseMetaData.getIndexInfo(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), table.getName(), false, true);
00355             }
00356             Map<String, Index> indexMap = new HashMap<String, Index>();
00357             while (rs.next()) {
00358                 String indexName = rs.getString("INDEX_NAME");
00359                 short type = rs.getShort("TYPE");
00360 //                String tableName = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME");
00361                 String columnName = rs.getString("COLUMN_NAME");
00362                 short position = rs.getShort("ORDINAL_POSITION");
00363                 String filterCondition = rs.getString("FILTER_CONDITION");
00364 
00365                 if (type == DatabaseMetaData.tableIndexStatistic) {
00366                     continue;
00367                 }
00368 
00369                 if (columnName == null) {
00370                     //nothing to index, not sure why these come through sometimes
00371                     continue;
00372                 }
00373                 Index indexInformation;
00374                 if (indexMap.containsKey(indexName)) {
00375                     indexInformation = indexMap.get(indexName);
00376                 } else {
00377                     indexInformation = new Index();
00378                     indexInformation.setTable(table);
00379                     indexInformation.setName(indexName);
00380                     indexInformation.setFilterCondition(filterCondition);
00381                     indexMap.put(indexName, indexInformation);
00382                 }
00383                 indexInformation.getColumns().add(position - 1, columnName);
00384             }
00385             for (Map.Entry<String, Index> entry : indexMap.entrySet()) {
00386                 indexes.add(entry.getValue());
00387             }
00388             rs.close();
00389             if (statement != null) {
00390                 statement.close();
00391             }
00392         }
00393 
00394         Set<Index> indexesToRemove = new HashSet<Index>();
00395         //remove PK indexes
00396         for (Index index : indexes) {
00397             for (PrimaryKey pk : primaryKeys) {
00398                 if (index.getTable().getName().equalsIgnoreCase(pk.getTable().getName())
00399                         && index.getColumnNames().equals(pk.getColumnNames())) {
00400                     indexesToRemove.add(index);
00401                 }
00402             }
00403         }
00404         indexes.removeAll(indexesToRemove);
00405     }
00406 
00407     private void readPrimaryKeys(String schema) throws JDBCException, SQLException {
00408         updateListeners("Reading primary keys for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00409 
00410         //we can't add directly to the this.primaryKeys hashSet because adding columns to an exising PK changes the hashCode and .contains() fails
00411         List<PrimaryKey> foundPKs = new ArrayList<PrimaryKey>();
00412 
00413         for (Table table : tablesMap.values()) {
00414             ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getPrimaryKeys(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), table.getName());
00415 
00416             while (rs.next()) {
00417                 String tableName = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME");
00418                 String columnName = rs.getString("COLUMN_NAME");
00419                 short position = rs.getShort("KEY_SEQ");
00420 
00421                 boolean foundExistingPK = false;
00422                 for (PrimaryKey pk : foundPKs) {
00423                     if (pk.getTable().getName().equals(tableName)) {
00424                         pk.addColumnName(position - 1, columnName);
00425 
00426                         foundExistingPK = true;
00427                     }
00428                 }
00429 
00430                 if (!foundExistingPK) {
00431                     PrimaryKey primaryKey = new PrimaryKey();
00432                     primaryKey.setTable(table);
00433                     primaryKey.addColumnName(position - 1, columnName);
00434                     primaryKey.setName(rs.getString("PK_NAME"));
00435 
00436                     foundPKs.add(primaryKey);
00437                 }
00438             }
00439 
00440             rs.close();
00441         }
00442 
00443         this.primaryKeys.addAll(foundPKs);
00444     }

00460     private void readSequences(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00461         updateListeners("Reading sequences for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00462 
00463         if (database.supportsSequences()) {
00464             //noinspection unchecked
00465             List<String> sequenceNamess = (List<String>) database.getJdbcTemplate().queryForList(database.createFindSequencesSQL(schema), String.class);
00466 
00467 
00468             for (String sequenceName : sequenceNamess) {
00469                 Sequence seq = new Sequence();
00470                 seq.setName(sequenceName.trim());
00471 
00472                 sequences.add(seq);
00473             }
00474         }
00475     }
00476 
00477     private void updateListeners(String message) {
00478         if (this.statusListeners == null) {
00479             return;
00480         }
00481         log.finest(message);
00482         for (DiffStatusListener listener : this.statusListeners) {
00483             listener.statusUpdate(message);
00484         }
00485     }
00486 
00490     public Table getTable(String tableName) {
00491         for (Table table : getTables()) {
00492             if (table.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(tableName)) {
00493                 return table;
00494             }
00495         }
00496         return null;
00497     }
00498 
00499     public ForeignKey getForeignKey(String foreignKeyName) {
00500         for (ForeignKey fk : getForeignKeys()) {
00501             if (fk.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(foreignKeyName)) {
00502                 return fk;
00503             }
00504         }
00505         return null;
00506     }
00507 
00508     public Sequence getSequence(String sequenceName) {
00509         for (Sequence sequence : getSequences()) {
00510             if (sequence.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(sequenceName)) {
00511                 return sequence;
00512             }
00513         }
00514         return null;
00515     }

00517     public Index getIndex(String indexName) {
00518         for (Index index : getIndexes()) {
00519             if (index.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(indexName)) {
00520                 return index;
00521             }
00522         }
00523         return null;
00524     }
00525 
00526     public View getView(String viewName) {
00527         for (View view : getViews()) {
00528             if (view.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(viewName)) {
00529                 return view;
00530             }
00531         }
00532         return null;
00533     }
00534 
00535     public PrimaryKey getPrimaryKey(String pkName) {
00536         for (PrimaryKey pk : getPrimaryKeys()) {
00537             if (pk.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(pkName)) {
00538                 return pk;
00539             }
00540         }
00541         return null;
00542     }
